name: Grandmother lost something again...
description:
You have to find the stuff of your grandmother. She always lose her things! Remember the objects she wants you to find and find them within the time. Be aware, the time is running as soon as you can read her message to find her stuff. The faster you are, the more points you get.

Reach the highscore in the global highscore-list!

Game made for the GGJ 2021
